_each.description: (Underscore) Iterates over a list of elements, yielding each in turn to an iteratee function.

_filter.description: (Underscore.js) Looks through each value in the list, returning an array of all the values that pass a truth test (predicate).

_findWhere.description: (Underscore.js) Looks through the list and returns the first value that matches all of the key-value pairs listed in properties.

_map.description: (Underscore.js) Produces a new array of values by mapping each value in list through a transformation function (iterator).

_size.description: (Underscore.js) Return the number of values in the list.
